Adult.description: Northern Mockingbirds are lankier than Sage Thrashers, with a longer tail and a slightly shorter bill. They have clean whitish underparts unlike Sage Thrashers, which have streaked underparts.
Bendire's Thrashers have longer tails than Sage Thrashers, with a longer and more curved bill. They also have faint spotting on the breast while Sage has a streaked breast and flanks.

Adult/immature.description: Curve-billed Thrashers are larger than Sage Thrashers and have a longer, curved bill compared with the short, straight bill of Sage Thrashers.
